verses.text: \w After|strong="H7971"\w* \w that|strong="H5971"\w*, \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* Aaron \w went|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* said, “\w This|strong="H3541"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: ‘\w Let|strong="H7971"\w* \w My|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w go|strong="H7971"\w*, \w so|strong="H3541"\w* \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* hold \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w feast|strong="H2287"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w Me|strong="H7971"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*.’”

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* replied, “\w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3045"\w* \w I|strong="H3045"\w* \w should|strong="H3068"\w* \w obey|strong="H8085"\w* \w His|strong="H3068"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w let|strong="H7971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w go|strong="H7971"\w*? \w I|strong="H3045"\w* \w do|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w I|strong="H3045"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w let|strong="H7971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w go|strong="H7971"\w*.”

“\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Hebrews|strong="H5680"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w met|strong="H7122"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w us|strong="H4994"\w*,” \w they|strong="H3117"\w* answered. “\w Please|strong="H4994"\w* \w let|strong="H4994"\w* \w us|strong="H4994"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* three-day \w journey|strong="H1870"\w* \w into|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H2076"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w or|strong="H6435"\w* \w He|strong="H3117"\w* \w may|strong="H4994"\w* \w strike|strong="H6293"\w* \w us|strong="H4994"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w plagues|strong="H1870"\w* \w or|strong="H6435"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*.”

\w But|strong="H6544"\w* \w the|strong="H4872"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* said \w to|strong="H3212"\w* them, “\w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* Aaron, \w why|strong="H4100"\w* \w do|strong="H4100"\w* \w you|strong="H4100"\w* \w draw|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H4872"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w away|strong="H3212"\w* \w from|strong="H3212"\w* \w their|strong="H4714"\w* \w work|strong="H4639"\w*? \w Get|strong="H3212"\w* \w back|strong="H6544"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w your|strong="H4100"\w* \w labor|strong="H5450"\w*!”

\w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w also|strong="H5971"\w* said, “\w Look|strong="H2005"\w*, \w the|strong="H6258"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w of|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H6258"\w* land \w are|strong="H5971"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w* \w numerous|strong="H7227"\w*, \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w you|strong="H5971"\w* \w would|strong="H5971"\w* \w be|strong="H5971"\w* stopping them \w from|strong="H7673"\w* \w their|strong="H6258"\w* \w labor|strong="H5450"\w*.” Bricks and Straw

\w That|strong="H5971"\w* \w same|strong="H1931"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w taskmasters|strong="H5065"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w their|strong="H3117"\w* \w foremen|strong="H7860"\w*:

“\w You|strong="H5414"\w* \w shall|strong="H5971"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w longer|strong="H3254"\w* supply \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w with|strong="H3212"\w* \w straw|strong="H8401"\w* \w for|strong="H5414"\w* \w making|strong="H5414"\w* \w bricks|strong="H3843"\w*. \w They|strong="H1992"\w* \w must|strong="H3808"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w gather|strong="H7197"\w* \w their|strong="H5414"\w* \w own|strong="H5971"\w* \w straw|strong="H8401"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* require \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w same|strong="H3651"\w* \w quota|strong="H4971"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w bricks|strong="H3843"\w* \w as|strong="H6213"\w* \w before|strong="H4480"\w*; \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w reduce|strong="H1639"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w*. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w lazy|strong="H7503"\w*; \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3651"\w* \w why|strong="H5921"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w crying|strong="H6817"\w* \w out|strong="H4480"\w*, ‘\w Let|strong="H7503"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H2076"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w our|strong="H5921"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w*.’

\w Make|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w work|strong="H5656"\w* harder \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w men|strong="H6213"\w* \w so|strong="H6213"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H1697"\w* \w be|strong="H1697"\w* \w occupied|strong="H6213"\w* \w and|strong="H6213"\w* \w pay|strong="H8159"\w* \w no|strong="H6213"\w* \w attention|strong="H8159"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w these|strong="H6213"\w* \w lies|strong="H8267"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w taskmasters|strong="H5065"\w* \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w foremen|strong="H7860"\w* \w of|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w said|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*, “\w This|strong="H3541"\w* \w is|strong="H5971"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: ‘\w I|strong="H5414"\w* am \w no|strong="H5414"\w* longer \w giving|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w straw|strong="H8401"\w*.

\w Go|strong="H3212"\w* \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w get|strong="H3947"\w* \w your|strong="H3947"\w* own \w straw|strong="H8401"\w* wherever \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w can|strong="H3947"\w* \w find|strong="H4672"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w*; \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w your|strong="H3947"\w* workload \w will|strong="H1697"\w* \w in|strong="H3212"\w* \w no|strong="H4672"\w* \w way|strong="H3212"\w* \w be|strong="H1697"\w* \w reduced|strong="H1639"\w*.’”

\w So|strong="H6327"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w scattered|strong="H6327"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w over|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land \w of|strong="H5971"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w to|strong="H4714"\w* \w gather|strong="H7197"\w* \w stubble|strong="H7179"\w* \w for|strong="H4714"\w* \w straw|strong="H8401"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3117"\w* \w taskmasters|strong="H5065"\w* \w kept|strong="H1961"\w* pressing \w them|strong="H3615"\w*, \w saying|strong="H1697"\w*, “\w Fulfill|strong="H3615"\w* \w your|strong="H1961"\w* \w quota|strong="H4639"\w* \w each|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w just|strong="H1697"\w* \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w you|strong="H3117"\w* \w did|strong="H3117"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w straw|strong="H8401"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* provided.”

\w Then|strong="H1571"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Israelite|strong="H3478"\w* \w foremen|strong="H7860"\w*, whom \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*’s \w taskmasters|strong="H5065"\w* \w had|strong="H3478"\w* \w set|strong="H7760"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w people|strong="H1121"\w*, \w were|strong="H3478"\w* \w beaten|strong="H5221"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* asked, “\w Why|strong="H4069"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w fulfilled|strong="H3615"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* quota \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w bricks|strong="H3835"\w* \w yesterday|strong="H8543"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w today|strong="H3117"\w*, \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w did|strong="H3478"\w* \w before|strong="H5921"\w*?” The Cry of the Israelites

\w So|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w Israelite|strong="H3478"\w* \w foremen|strong="H7860"\w* \w went|strong="H3478"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w appealed|strong="H6817"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*: “\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w* treating \w your|strong="H6213"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w this|strong="H6213"\w* \w way|strong="H3541"\w*?

\w No|strong="H6213"\w* \w straw|strong="H8401"\w* \w has|strong="H5650"\w* \w been|strong="H5971"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, \w yet|strong="H2398"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H5971"\w* \w told|strong="H6213"\w*, ‘\w Make|strong="H6213"\w* \w bricks|strong="H3843"\w*!’ \w Look|strong="H2009"\w*, \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w are|strong="H5971"\w* \w being|strong="H5971"\w* \w beaten|strong="H5221"\w*, \w but|strong="H2009"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w fault|strong="H2398"\w* \w is|strong="H2009"\w* \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w own|strong="H5971"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.”

“\w You|strong="H5921"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w slackers|strong="H7503"\w*!” Pharaoh replied. “\w Slackers|strong="H7503"\w*! \w That|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w why|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* keep saying, ‘\w Let|strong="H7503"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H2076"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.’

\w Now|strong="H6258"\w* \w get|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w work|strong="H5647"\w*. \w You|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w straw|strong="H8401"\w*, \w yet|strong="H6258"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w must|strong="H3808"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* full \w quota|strong="H8506"\w* \w of|strong="H5647"\w* \w bricks|strong="H3843"\w*.”

\w The|strong="H7200"\w* \w Israelite|strong="H3478"\w* \w foremen|strong="H7860"\w* \w realized|strong="H7200"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w were|strong="H3478"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w trouble|strong="H7451"\w* \w when|strong="H3117"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w were|strong="H3478"\w* \w told|strong="H1697"\w*, “\w You|strong="H3117"\w* \w must|strong="H1121"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w reduce|strong="H1639"\w* \w your|strong="H7200"\w* \w daily|strong="H3117"\w* quota \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w bricks|strong="H3843"\w*.”

\w When|strong="H3318"\w* \w they|strong="H3318"\w* \w left|strong="H3318"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*, \w they|strong="H3318"\w* \w confronted|strong="H7125"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* Aaron, \w who|strong="H6547"\w* \w stood|strong="H5324"\w* \w waiting|strong="H5324"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* \w them|strong="H3318"\w*.

“\w May|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w look|strong="H7200"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w*,” \w the|strong="H5921"\w* foremen said, “\w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H5414"\w* \w us|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* stench \w before|strong="H5869"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w officials|strong="H5650"\w*; \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w placed|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w kill|strong="H2026"\w* \w us|strong="H5414"\w*!”

\w So|strong="H7971"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w asked|strong="H4100"\w*, “\w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w why|strong="H4100"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w You|strong="H7971"\w* \w brought|strong="H7725"\w* \w trouble|strong="H2088"\w* \w upon|strong="H5971"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*? \w Is|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w why|strong="H4100"\w* \w You|strong="H7971"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w me|strong="H7971"\w*?

\w Ever|strong="H2088"\w* since \w I|strong="H2088"\w* \w went|strong="H5971"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w in|strong="H1696"\w* \w Your|strong="H3808"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w has|strong="H2088"\w* \w brought|strong="H7489"\w* \w trouble|strong="H2088"\w* \w on|strong="H1696"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w You|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H5971"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5337"\w* \w Your|strong="H3808"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w in|strong="H1696"\w* \w any|strong="H3808"\w* \w way|strong="H2088"\w*.”
